title: (38712) Breña Baja - 168 Calle la Montaña

A bit of passage in the evening but nothing very disturbing. Easy to access too. No service apart from a small water point at the watchtower, inaccessible from the car park.

title: (38712) Breña Baja - 163 Calle la Montaña

title: (38738) Aeropuerto de la Palma - Unnamed Road

title: (38758) Barrial de Arriba -

Please do not leave any traces of your passage.

title: (38738) Villa de Mazo - 116 LP-206

 service

name: Laguna Camping
title: (38727) Laguna Camping

Very nice staff & tranquil area ...good to know that they do not allow dogs !

title: (38760) Los Llanos - 48B Calle Enrique Mederos Lorenzo

title: (38727) Lomo Romero -

title: (38780) El Jesús - 47 Calle Lomo Pueblo

title: (38780) Tijarafe - 3 Calle Pueblo
description: Parking for at least 60 vehicles. Quite spacious and with views of the ravine and the sea. There is a small dumpster across the road. Being right next to the road, noise from cars could be annoying. Flat parking. Near the town (restoration, shops...). GOODLIFE!

title: (38769) El Remo - 2 Calle Manuela Sotomayor
description: Area to spend the night next to El Remo, a beautiful village that is worth visiting. Alternative place if you get kicked out of Charco Verde

title: (38726) Barlovento - 2 Calle la Fajana
description: RV park without services. At the end of the road there is a large free gravel place to spend the night. The sunrise with the Punta Cumplida lighthouse in the background is spectacular. The CP CAMAJUANI next door is private and more like an allotment garden. Busy on weekends and public holidays. In Barlovento (approx. 7 km away) there is a petrol station, supermarkets and an ATM. Sea water swimming pool, promenade.

title: (38780) Tijarafe - 40 Carretera C 832
description: Public parking. The best thing about it is that it is covered and it is spacious. If it rains a lot, it is a good place to stop and go outside

title: (38749) Las Caletas - Unnamed Road

title: (38749) - Pista Fuente de los Roques
description: Parking lot from natural reserve with picnic area. Really nice views especially if you drive further into the site.

title: (38728) Grafía -
description: The free parking of the Parque Cultural de la Zarza is cool, especially in seasons with low tourism. The parking lot is a little steep not much, but there is a flat dirt space next door for 2-3 cars.

title: (38749) Las Indias -
description: Small square below the street. No service, take everything or more with you, so that everyone can enjoy parking longer!

title: (38780) El Jesús - P22H+WP
description: Level parking lot above the smugglers' gorge. Super quiet and beautiful sunsets. Curvy descent, but paved road.

title: (38780) El Jesús -
description: Another parking lot at the end of the street. No cell phone reception downstairs. Very steep ascent (approx. 20%). Clutch and power should fit! If you walk about 1km further to the bottom, you will find a small settlement with a natural pool.

title: (38780) Tijarafe - Parking Playa de la Veta
title_short: (38780) Tijarafe - Parking Playa de la Veta
description: Car parks to access the beach where you can spend the night quietly and watch a beautiful sunset. The road is quite steep with very hairpin bends. Highly recommended!

title: (38788) Diseminado el Rito - 30 Diseminado Castillo
description: Small nice place under the pines that we visited after a strenuous hike. Located on a quiet street. Great for the evening sun :)

title: (38728) Villa de Garafía - Calle San Antonio
title_short: (38728) Villa de Garafía - Calle San Antonio
description: Camping area San Antonio de Monte, has all the services. All the services are free to date (March 2018)

title: (38740) Los Canarios - Km 24 Carretera General
description: Cheapest gas station on La Palma...

title: (38728) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 1 Diseminado San Antonio
title_short: (38728) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 1 Diseminado San Antonio
description: A free water tap next to the road if you dont want to pay for the campsite and only need water

title: (38749) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 5 Diseminado Playa Zamora
title_short: (38749) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 5 Diseminado Playa Zamora
description: Playa de la Zamora, we have bathed surrounded by fish, it is a paradisiacal place where it seems that time has stopped, ideal to park, spend the night and sleep with the sound of the waves, there is a private club of motorhomes, which have been very friendly and attentive to us, there is also a restaurant, Kiosco La Zamora, with fresh fish at a very good price. I recommend coming early or late to get a place and park, since there are only two possible places for motorhomes, without a doubt we will return.

title: (38749) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - Unnamed Road
title_short: (38749) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - Unnamed Road
description: Nice picnic spot by an old pine tree! Invites you to linger!

title: (38749) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - Unnamed Road
title_short: (38749) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - Unnamed Road
description: Parking near several hiking trails. Also off road for 4x4 nearby. There is a water tap at the picnic area, but you cannot reach it with the camper.

title: (38740) Los Canarios - 1 Calle N Catorce Fuencaliente
title_short: (38740) Los Canarios - 1 Calle N Catorce Fuencaliente
description: Another picnic area with BBQ... Street parking!

name: Nature Center La Rosa - Association Outdoor -
title: (38789) Nature Center La Rosa - Association Outdoor -
title_short: (38789) Nature Center La Rosa - Association Outdoor -
description: Small campsite in the sparse forest above Puntagorda. Basically only a campsite, but Mglk. to stand in the parking lot. Register beforehand eg via WA. Accessible via a narrow access road. Not suitable for large WoMo. Partial sea view and beautiful starry sky.

title: (38749) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 1 Diseminado Caletas
title_short: (38749) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 1 Diseminado Caletas
description: Very quiet next to a picnic area with fire pits, drinking water and stone tables at 450 meters with views of Tenerife, La Gomera and El Hierro.

title: (38749) La Fajana - 16 Calle Fajana
description: Place to park day and night. Despite being next to the road, it is quiet. Sea views when there is no haze ...

title: (38740) Los Canarios - 108-114 Carretera General el Tablado
title_short: (38740) Los Canarios - 108-114 Carretera General el Tablado
description: Picnic area near the village. Right next to the main street which is busy during the day but totally quiet at night. The water tap works, about 25 meters from the parking lot. Either bring a hose to fill or carry canisters to fill your camper tank.

title: (38740) Los Canarios - 18 Carretera General el Tablado
title_short: (38740) Los Canarios - 18 Carretera General el Tablado
description: Picnic area at the sports field. Parking along the street.

title: (38788) Las Tricias - 29 Diseminado Lomo los Barrero
title_short: (38788) Las Tricias - 29 Diseminado Lomo los Barrero
description:
Very beautiful and calm place to stay at night. It is just under the usual parking spots that are next to the church. 

From here you have a very beautiful view to the mountains and few houses. You can also start directly an absolutely beautiful hike towards Buracas Cave or the museum where they explain you how gofio is made and where it originally comes from. 
On a Friday night you could hear some women singing on the other side of the hill. However, overall it has been very quiet and we could sleep very well!
The little village is absolutely beautiful! ✨

title: (38789) Puntagorda - Camino el Pinar
description: Large parking lot in the forest, next to the soccer field. Lovely views, quiet (except when they play soccer). Easy access through a track a few meters from the main road. There is a bar nearby. Big ground parking place in the forest, next to the football court. Beautiful views. Silence, you cannot hear the road traffic. Easy access through a few meters dirt road from the main road. There is a bar by the stadium.

title: (38789) Puntagorda - 78 Carretera General
description: Repsol Diesel station. Water tap

title: (38789) Puntagorda - 7C Avenida la Constitución
description: parking spot

title: (38789) Puntagorda - 12 Camino el Pinar
description: Parking places, resting area ideal for motorhomes , about 10 places maybe, children playground, outdoor gym, supermarket nearby

title: (38789) Puntagorda - 1 Calle el Fayal
description: Farmers market. The market only works on Saturdays and Sundays. Sloped parking, picnic area, restrooms, clean water, grills, children's play area and even electricity, all for free. As a bonus, a superb view from the viewpoint of Izcagua at the car park

title: (38740) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 23 Calle Antonio Hernandez Hernandez
title_short: (38740) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 23 Calle Antonio Hernandez Hernandez
description: Quiet parking lot just outside of town

title: (38789) Puntagorda - 56A Camino el Pinar
description: Ample asphalt and perfectly leveled parking lot, very quiet to spend the night. Next to the farmer's market that is open on Saturday afternoon and Sunday morning.

title: (38789) Puntagorda - 7 Camino Miraflores
description: Parking at the Mirador to observe the stars, with a drinking water point

title: (38728) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - Calle Juan Adalid
title_short: (38728) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - Calle Juan Adalid
description: 360 view at the end of the path. The whole area is accessed to a vertiginous off-road path.

title: (38728) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - Calle el Mudo
title_short: (38728) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - Calle el Mudo
description: Vertiginous off-road path to access to the whole area. Breath taking natural pools just next : (28.8572970, -17.9114337)

title: (38787) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 4 Diseminado Calvario
title_short: (38787) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 4 Diseminado Calvario
description: Convenient and level parking near the soccer field.

title: (38787) Santo Domingo - 9A Calle Díaz y Suárez
title_short: (38787) Santo Domingo - 9A Calle Díaz y Suárez
description: Land parking, in flat, secluded, near the main square of Garafía. The town is very quiet, there is not much traffic / noise. Water and public toilets in the town hall during the day. Restaurant and cafeteria at 5min.

title: (38787) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 1A Diseminado Calvario
title_short: (38787) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 1A Diseminado Calvario
description: A large free, flat car park with beautiful views, next to the cemetery. Cars are not heard much, there is little traffic, the road ends a few km from the viewpoint of Santo Domingo de Garafía.

title: (38787) Santo Domingo - Pista del Puerto de Santo Domingo
title_short: (38787) Santo Domingo - Pista del Puerto de Santo Domingo
description: The Mirador El Serradero de Santo Domingo car park has spectacular views, but it is a bit steep. Drinking water. If it is too steep you can go up a bit and sleep near the cemetery where it is plane and there are also bathrooms. On the path below where there are the caves there is a esplanade where you could sleep with a hut.

address.street: Pista del Puerto de Santo Domingo

One side sea view, other side Teneguia volcano. There is a kind of house that is for rent, the road may be improved in the future for regular cars.

title: (38740) Los Canarios -
